name: KILL LULU
description:
LULU was some kind of pet living in the club, but somehow they started to attack people. That is why you are here, come kill them all. There will be 2 LULU born every 10 seconds; I have no idea why I wrote all of these, just shoot them.

WASD for moving

SHIFT for speed up

LEFT CLICK for shooting

SPACE for jump
